graphql.query:
mutation ($payload:MessageCreateMessageInput!)
{
	messageCreateMessage (payload:$payload)
	{
		id
		rowId
		tenantIds
		status
		accountRecipientIds
		tenantRecipientIds
		scopeRecipients
		tagRecipients
		sendAt
		isImportant
		subject
		body
		link
		isInternalLink
		image
		icon
		attachments
		totalRecipients
		reads
		meta
	}
}

graphql.query:
query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	messageGetMessages (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		tenantIds
		status
		accountRecipientIds
		tenantRecipientIds
		scopeRecipients
		tagRecipients
		sendAt
		isImportant
		subject
		body
		link
		isInternalLink
		image
		icon
		attachments
		totalRecipients
		reads
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($query:QueryStatement)
{
	messageFindMessage (query: $query)
	{
		id
		rowId
		tenantIds
		status
		accountRecipientIds
		tenantRecipientIds
		scopeRecipients
		tagRecipients
		sendAt
		isImportant
		subject
		body
		link
		isInternalLink
		image
		icon
		attachments
		totalRecipients
		reads
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}

query ($id:ID)
{
	messageFindMessageById (id:$id)
	{
		id
		rowId
		tenantIds
		status
		accountRecipientIds
		tenantRecipientIds
		scopeRecipients
		tagRecipients
		sendAt
		isImportant
		subject
		body
		link
		isInternalLink
		image
		icon
		attachments
		totalRecipients
		reads
		meta
		createdAt
		updatedAt
	}
}
